title: Lupin III: Fuuma Ichizoku no Inbou (Lupin III: The Fuma Conspiracy)
synopsis: Goemon's wedding to Murasaki Inabe, daughter of a samurai clan's leader, is interrupted when the Fuma ninjas attack, kidnapping the bride-to-be and demanding her family's ancient treasure as ransom. Lupin, Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko work together once again to try to save Murasaki and get to the treasure before the Fuma can steal it.
characters: ['Lupin III, Arsene', 'Jigen, Daisuke', 'Mine, Fujiko', 'Ishikawa XIII, Goemon', 'Murasaki', 'Zenigata, Kouichi']
voices: ['Furukawa, Toshio', 'Ginga, Banjou', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Shou, Mayumi', 'Katou, Seizou']
staff: [['Urakami, Yasuo', ['Sound Director']], ['Ozeki, Masayuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Ooseki, Masayuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Monkey Punch', ['Original Creator']]]
